title: WhatChaMaCallIt!
Body: This is a forum webiste that I made with the help of my classmates Tony Crosby, Parth Patel, and Mario Thompson.

title: Workout-Tracker
Body: This is a web application that allows the user to input their workouts and stores them then creates graphs based on the workouts that they have preformed.

title: Employee-Tracker w/React
Body: This is a Web application that allows the user to search from a list of randomly generated users and then sort the users alphabetically by their name.

title: Weather-App
Body: This is a web application that allows the user to search a city and then displays the current weather conditions and a 5 day forecast it also stores your searches in local storage so you can revist a previous search.

title: GameDataFinder
Body: This a simple search engine that I created with the help of two of my classmates Beth Spencer and Parth Patel, it allows the user to search for a game and then displays information about the searched game.

title: Noter Taker!
Body: This is a Web application that allows the user to write and save notes to a database.
